function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High transmission rates and widespread infection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, health organizations"},{"Description":"Urban connectivity and COVID-19 diffusion","Impact":"Concentration of cases in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare infrastructure in urban centers, promoting social distancing measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Limited containment in isolated regions","Impact":"Risk of prolonged community transmission and lack of resources for management","Mitigation":"Strengthening public health response, providing resources for testing and treatment","Technologies":"Mobile testing units, telehealth platforms","People":"Residents of isolated regions","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
